description:
Rustal Elion is the head of the Erion family that belongs to the Seven Stars. He serves as commander of the Outer Lunar Orbit Joint Fleet Arianrhod. With a heroic personality and the firm support of his subordinates, he has unquestioned influence within Gjallarhorn. He observes and counters McGillis`s secret maneuvering within the organization.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Rustal Elion
